owl:Ontology.terms:contributor: Ignacio Lázaro (Tekniker) <ignacio.lazaro@tekniker.es> Andoni Osorio (Tekniker) <andoni.osorio@tekniker.es> Marko Jelić (Institut Mihajlo Pupin) <marko.jelic@pupin.rs> Spyros Tzavikas (Grid Singularity) <spyros@gridsingularity.com>
owl:Ontology.terms:creator: Cristina Aceta (Tekniker) <cristina.aceta@tekniker.es>
owl:Ontology.terms:description: This ontology module includes the necessary classes and properties to model energy assets.
owl:Ontology.terms:title: Energy Asset: Energy Asset module for the FEDECOM Ontology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the azimuth angle associated with an asset, typically for orientation purposes.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has azimuth

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the COP for heating mode of an asset.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has COP heating

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the COP for cooling mode of an asset.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has COP cooling

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an asset to its overall capacity (energy, power, or material).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has capacity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an asset to a specific characteristic or attribute that describes its properties.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has characteristic

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an asset to the rate at which it charges energy or material
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has charge flow rate

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an asset to a charging point for electric vehicles or devices.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has charging point

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an asset with its COP value, representing efficiency in heating or cooling.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has coefficient of performance

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the efficiency of an asset in converting one energy form to another.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has conversion efficiency

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an asset to the rate at which it discharges energy or material.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has discharge flow rate

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an asset to its overall efficiency.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has efficiency

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the electrical capacity of an asset, such as a battery or PV system.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has electric capacity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the efficiency of electrical energy conversion for an asset.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has electric efficiency

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an asset with its model identifier or specification.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has model

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an asset with its power value (rate of energy transfer).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has power

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the maximum power rating of an asset.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has power rating

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an asset to its electrical resistance value.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has resistance

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an asset with its ability to store energy or material.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has storage capacity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an asset to the volume of its storage tank.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has storage tank volume

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an asset with the space it works for.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has target

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an asset to its thermal capacity, indicating heat storage or transfer capability.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has thermal capacity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the efficiency of thermal energy conversion for an asset.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has thermal efficiency

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the tilt angle of an asset (e.g., solar panel).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has tilt

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Associates an asset with its physical volume.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has volume

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Defines a hierarchical relationship where a sub-meter asset belongs to a main meter asset.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is submeter of

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
Specifies the type of connection configuration for an asset. Allowed values:
parallel – Components are connected in parallel, sharing input and output points to maintain equal voltage. series – Components are connected in sequence, so the same current flows through each component.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: connection type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Defines the range of capacity values for an asset (minimum and maximum).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: capacity range

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the maximum power rating of an asset.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: maximum power rating

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the target value or setpoint for controlling an asset (e.g., temperature, pressure).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: setpoint

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Represents the current operational state of an asset.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: state

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Boolean property indicating whether an asset functions as generation equipment.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: is generation equipment

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the number of panels associated with a PV system.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: number of panels

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that conditions and circulates air as part of an HVAC system, typically including fans, filters, and heat exchangers.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Air Handling Unit

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The angular measurement in the horizontal plane between a reference direction (usually true north) and the direction of a solar panel.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Azimuth

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A boiler that uses biomass (organic material) as fuel to produce heat or steam.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Biomass Boiler

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A burner designed to combust biomass fuel for heat generation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Biomass Burner

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that heats water or produces steam for heating or power generation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Boiler

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A component that mixes fuel and air and initiates combustion to produce heat.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Burner

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A damper that redirects airflow to maintain pressure or temperature balance in HVAC systems.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bypass Damper

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The coefficient of performance for cooling mode.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: COP Cooling

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The coefficient of performance for heating mode.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: COP Heating

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The maximum amount of energy, power, or material that a system or component can store, produce, or handle under specified conditions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Capacity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A property or attribute that describes a specific feature or quality of an entity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Characteristic

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The rate at which energy or material is added to a storage system during charging.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Charge Flow Rate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that removes heat from a liquid via vapor-compression or absorption refrigeration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Chiller

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A ratio that measures the efficiency of a heating or cooling system.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Coefficient of Performance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A tank used to store chilled water or other fluids for cooling applications.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cold Storage Tank

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A component that captures and transfers energy, typically solar thermal collectors for heat.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Collector

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A system that simultaneously generates electricity and useful heat from a single energy source.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Combined Heat Power

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An individual part or element of a system that performs a specific function.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Component

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A high-efficiency gas boiler that recovers latent heat from exhaust gases by condensing water vapor.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Condensing Gas Boiler

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A variable or setting used to regulate or adjust the behavior of a system or process.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Control Parameter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A standard gas-fired boiler that heats water without condensing exhaust gases.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Conventional Gas Boiler

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The efficiency with which a system converts one form of energy into another (e.g., chemical to electrical).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Conversion Efficiency

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that regulates airflow in ducts or ventilation systems.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Damper

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A physical or virtual entity designed to perform a specific function within a system, typically involving measurement, control, conversion, or communication of energy, signals, or materials.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The rate at which energy or material is removed from a storage system during discharging.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Discharge Flow Rate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A centralized facility that produces heat and distributes it to multiple buildings through a network.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electric Heating Plant

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that supplies electric energy to recharge electric vehicle batteries.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EV Charger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A physical location equipped with an EV charger for vehicle charging.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EV Charging Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The ratio of useful output (energy, power, or work) to the total input.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Efficiency

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A boiler that uses electrical energy to heat water or produce steam.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electric Boiler

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The efficiency of converting electrical energy into useful work or another energy form.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electric Efficiency

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that converts electrical energy into heat.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electric Heater

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A meter that measures electrical energy consumption
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electric Meter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that uses electricity to split water into hydrogen and oxygen through electrolysis.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electrolizer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The amount of energy transferred per unit of time through a system or component.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Energy Flow Rate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A fan or device that removes air, fumes, or gases from a space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Extractor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A unit consisting of a fan and a heat exchanger coil used for heating or cooling air.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fan Coil

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The volume or mass of a substance (e.g., fluid, gas) passing through a point or system per unit of time.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Flow Rate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that converts chemical energy from hydrogen or other fuels into electricity through electrochemical reactions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fuel Cell

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A heat recovery device that captures heat from exhaust fumes for reuse.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fume Recuperator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A meter that measures energy exchanged between a building and the electrical grid.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Grid Meter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A tank specifically designed to store hydrogen safely under controlled conditions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hydrogen Storage Tank

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning equipment that regulate indoor climate.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Heating Ventilation Air Conditioning Equipment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A meter that measures thermal energy consumption.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Heat Meter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A tank that stores thermal energy, typically in the form of hot water or other heat-retaining materials.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Heat Storage Tank

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that converts energy (typically electrical, thermal, or chemical) into heat for the purpose of warming air, water, or other substances within a system or space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Heater

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A heating circuit designed to operate at high temperatures, typically for industrial or specialized applications.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: High Temperature Circuit

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A sensor that measures both humidity and temperature in an environment.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Humidity-Temperature Sensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that measures and records the consumption or flow of energy or resources.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Meter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The predefined boundaries or thresholds within which a system or component can operate safely and effectively.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Operating Limits

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A photovoltaic system that converts solar energy into electrical energy using solar panels and associated components.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Photovoltaic System

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The rate at which energy is transferred, converted, or consumed by a system or component.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Power

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The rate at which power is transmitted or distributed through a system.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Power Flow Rate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The maximum continuous power that a device or system can deliver or handle under specified conditions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Power Rating

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A measure of the opposition to the flow of electric current.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resistance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that detects and measures physical properties (e.g., temperature, pressure, light) and converts them into signals for monitoring or control.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An advanced meter that records consumption and communicates data digitally for monitoring and control.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Smart Meter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A container designed to store liquids or gases for later use.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Storage Tank

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The total internal volume of a tank designed to store fluids or gases.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Storage Tank Volume

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A meter installed downstream of a main meter to measure consumption for a specific area or device.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Submeter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The efficiency of converting thermal energy into useful work or another energy form.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thermal Efficiency

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A tank that stores thermal energy for heating or cooling purposes, often using phase-change materials or water.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thermal Storage Tank

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The angle between a surface (e.g., solar panel) and the horizontal plane.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tilt

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An electrical device that changes the voltage level of alternating current (AC) in a power system.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Voltage Transformer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The amount of three-dimensional space occupied by an object or substance.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Volume

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A valve with three ports used to control the flow and mixing of fluids in heating or cooling circuits.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: 3-Way Valve

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links an asset to its operational boundaries or thresholds.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has operating limits
